job_history.work_description: Prepared monthly and annual expense forecasts, including any necessary recommended action required to manage costs to achieve budget. Performed debit, credit and total accounts on computer spreadsheets/databases, using specialized accounting software. Responsible to ensure that receivables are timely collected, Participate in preparation of Monthly Management reports, Stock taking, monthly, quarterly and yearly and running reports for inventory control and analysis, Inspection and follow up of warehouse for stock movement.

Reviewed accountant's book entries to ensure accuracy of the G/L. Responsible to ensure that receivables are timely collected, Participate in preparation of Monthly Management reports, Stock taking, monthly, quarterly and yearly and running reports for inventory control and analysis, Inspection and follow up of warehouse for stock movement.

Responsible to ensure that liabilities are paid on time and receivables are timely collected, Participate in preparation of Monthly Management reports, Maintaining accounts on daily basis, Stock taking and inventory report as well as warehouse inspection, Preparing and disbursing salary and leave to staff after checking of proper documentation.

Received, recorded, and banked cash, checks, and vouchers as well as reconciled records of bank transactions. Responsible for payable are paid on time and receivables are timely collected, Ensures Co. policies related to payments, and contracts are completely followed.

Performed debit, credit and total accounts on computer spreadsheets/databases, using specialized accounting software. Maintaining Accounts on daily basis up to finalization, Follow up Accounts receivables and daily reporting to the Management, Preparation of Inventory Reports, Sales Invoices, Purchase Invoices and all accounting Vouchers of debit & credit.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in accounting roles, with responsibilities including financial forecasting, budget management, accounts payable and receivable, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Consistently performed financial analysis tasks, including expense forecasting, budgeting, and financial reporting, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Prepared various financial reports, including monthly management reports, inventory reports, and sales invoices, indicating strong proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Responsible for inventory management, including stock taking, inventory reports, and warehouse inspection, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Prepared and disbursed salaries and leaves to staff, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Participated in budget management, including expense forecasting and budgeting, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Prepared expense forecasts and recommended actions to manage costs, showing a solid working proficiency in financial planning.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for financial analysis, reporting, and budgeting, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct leadership experience mentioned, but has worked in various accounting roles, indicating some practical experience in leadership.
